hadiths.english_translation: Heard Abu Hurayrah, Shu'bah narrated from him. Ali said: I think he is a Madinan. Muhammad ibn Abi Aoun Abu Bakr came to Basra, he said: Jacob ibn Isaac al-Hadramawt narrated to us, he said: Shu'bah narrated to us, from Daoud ibn Farahij, and he became old and impoverished.

hadiths.english_translation: Heard from Ibn Umar, Said ibn al-Sa'ib al-Hejazi said. Ziyad ibn Abi Ziyad said from Daoud ibn Abi Asim, from Said ibn al-Musayb. Abu Nu'aym narrated, from Sayf, from Qays ibn Sa'd, from Daoud ibn Abi Asim al-Thaqafi, heard Said ibn al-Musayb. Ibn Ishaq narrated from Noah ibn Hakim, from Daoud a man from the descendants of Urvah ibn Mas'ud whose mother was Umm Habibah, daughter of Abu Sufyan, from Layla daughter of Qanf. Ibn Khaythim narrated, heard Daoud ibn Abi Asim, heard Uthman ibn Abi al-As, and it is said: Daoud ibn Asim.

narrators.name: Said ibn al-Musayb
narrators.full_name: Said ibn al-Musayb ibn al-Hajjaj ibn Abd al-Malik al-Qurashi

narrators.name: Ibn Umar
